SAPORI

Sapori is an Italian style Steak House fine dinning restaurant. The purpose of this project was to create a minimal style, useable and modern Single Page Website that accurately translates the fine dinning experience that Sapori creates in their restaurant to their Website.

Website Github

Restaurant Essentials

Specific to Restaurant Websites, there are few things visitors expect to see. When designing this site I ensured that all were met including: The ability to make a reservation, Display a clear Menu, Hours of operation, Location and finally the Restaurants history and story.

Staying up with trends

It is import to keep up with trends when creating websites. Getting left behind is becoming incredibly easy. When considering the design and build process, I chose to build this Website with a React and Webpack Combo to take advantage of the most current and forward thinking approach to web development and also a minimalism design to stay current and future proof with a timeless design.

HTML5

WEBPACK

Building for mobile

No matter the industry, every website needs to be mobile friendly. As more users prefer to interact with the web through a mobile device, making it as easy or easier to do so is imperative to the success of a website.
